definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: There are 2 main categories for fictional television series, drama and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 美式電視劇分爲正劇和喜劇兩大類。

sentences.english: All of your friends wanna go see a play that's very serious.
sentences.chinese: 你所有的朋友都想去看一出很嚴肅的正劇。

sentences.english: Let the real drama of the Shadow 100 is a drama, as in the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 真正讓皮影成爲百戲中的正劇，當在宋代。

sentences.english: Both have done serious drama and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 兩人都曾出演過正劇和喜劇。

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
